proposal.fictionalClientDescription: Heritage Craft Collective is a UK-based retailer championing traditional British crafts, offering curated artisan goods both online and through their flagship London store. Their growing digital presence is central to their mission to connect modern consumers with time-honoured craftsmanship.
proposal.coverHeadline: Elevating Heritage Craft Collective: A Modern Identity for Timeless Craft
proposal.coverSubheadline: A practical partnership to build your brand and digital presence
proposal.clientOverview:
Heritage Craft Collective is at a pivotal stage in its journey. Having established a respected name in the artisan retail sector, you have successfully launched a flagship location in Shoreditch and built a loyal following among craft enthusiasts. Your curated selection of handmade ceramics, textiles, and woodwork has resonated with a discerning audience seeking authenticity and quality.

However, as your customer base expands beyond your physical store, your current digital brand and e-commerce platform are struggling to keep pace. You have ambitions to become the leading online destination for British craft, but your existing identity and online experience do not fully communicate your values or showcase your products’ unique stories. You have identified the need for a cohesive brand refresh, improved digital storytelling, and a robust e-commerce solution to support your next phase of growth.
proposal.problemAnalysis:
Your current brand identity, developed in-house several years ago, lacks the clarity and flexibility needed to stand out in a competitive market. The visual language is inconsistent across digital and print touchpoints, making it harder to communicate your values of authenticity, sustainability, and craftsmanship. This inconsistency risks diluting your message as you reach new audiences through digital channels and national press partnerships.

On the e-commerce front, your website is not optimised for mobile users and does not provide a seamless shopping experience. Product stories and artisan profiles, which are central to your brand, are difficult to access and do not translate into compelling calls to action. As a result, online conversion rates remain below industry benchmarks, and repeat purchases are limited by a lack of engaging content and community features. Without a unified brand and digital strategy, you risk missing out on the growing market for premium, story-driven retail experiences.
proposal.opportunitySection:
There is a clear opportunity to position Heritage Craft Collective as the authority in British craft retail, both online and offline. By developing a distinctive brand identity and a user-focused digital platform, you will not only attract new customers but also deepen engagement with your existing community. A refreshed visual identity and cohesive messaging will support your PR and partnership efforts, while an improved e-commerce experience will drive sales and loyalty.

Our approach is grounded in practical, collaborative design. We will work closely with your leadership and in-store teams to capture the spirit of your collective and translate it into every customer interaction, from packaging to digital campaigns. By integrating compelling storytelling, illustration, and seamless e-commerce functionality, we will help you build a brand that empowers your artisans and inspires your customers.
